# AI Query Revealer

> The first Generative Engine Optimization (GEO) Chrome extension. Intercepts hidden AI search queries from ChatGPT, Claude, and Gemini in real time.

## What It Does

AI Query Revealer is a Chrome extension that reveals the hidden web searches performed by AI platforms. When you ask ChatGPT, Claude, or Gemini a question, the AI silently generates 3-12 hidden search queries, consults 12+ web sources, and decides which sites to cite. AI Query Revealer intercepts this invisible process and displays it in real time.

Unlike competitors that simulate prompts via API (PromptMonitor, Knowatoa, Otterly), AI Query Revealer captures the actual fetch requests and Server-Sent Event (SSE) streams from AI platforms as they happen. This means users see real queries, real sources, and real citation decisions â€” not estimates.

## Key Features

- Real-time interception of hidden AI search queries (not simulation)
- GEO Score (0-100): AI visibility metric across 6 dimensions
- AI Citation tracking: cited vs consulted sources analysis
- Reformulation Gap analysis: measures difference between user prompt and actual AI search
- Platform comparison: ChatGPT vs Claude vs Gemini side by side
- AI SEO Technical Scanner: 6 pillars audited in 15 seconds
- Competitor monitoring: track up to 10 domains with notifications
- Professional PDF reports: GEO Audit Report (7 pages) and Dashboard Report (8 pages)
- Data export: CSV, JSON, PDF

## Proprietary Data and Findings

- Average hidden queries per prompt: 7.3
- Average Reformulation Gap: 47% (difference between what user asks and what AI actually searches)
- AI platforms consult 3.2x more sources than they cite
- Sites with Schema.org markup receive 30-40% more AI citations
- AI search sessions grew 527% year-over-year in 2025 (source: Previsible)
- 63% of websites receive AI-referred traffic (source: Ahrefs, 2025)

## Pricing

- Free: 1 demo search included
- Pro: EUR 39.99/month (EUR 399.99/year, save 17%)
- Agency: EUR 59.90/month (EUR 599.90/year, save 17%)

## Technical Details

- Platform: Google Chrome Extension (Manifest V3)
- Supported AI platforms: ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini
- Interception method: MAIN world script injection, window.fetch override, SSE stream parsing
- Data processing: 100% client-side, no data sent to external servers
- Languages: English, French

## Links

- Website: https://aiqueryrevealer.com
- Chrome Web Store: https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/ai-query-revealer
- Support: support@aiqueryrevealer.com
- Creator: William Loiseau
